Thanks for visiting your local BordersThanks for shopping Borders and giving us your email address As a Borders Mail subscriber youll receive email variety packs of our favorite book music and movie features interviews articles giveaways and exclusive store promotions Well bring you the best of Borders Understanding that our readers appreciate substance weve created additional newsletters covering many genres and topics including science fiction business mindbodyspirit womens studies romance literature nonfiction and DVDs Each email missive contains tips on big new releases and reviews of books from off the beaten path mixed in with intriguing interviews author essays and other fun bits Subscribing or heaven forbid unsubscribing to one or all of the newsletters is easy The link below will take you to your own personal subscription page Youll notice that the boxes next to The Newsletter and Borders Store Exclusives are already checked Your subscription page msaspHBXXXjoestepenovitchenroncom Should you need to log in to Borders Mail simply use your email address in all lowercase as your password You may change this password at any time Change your Borders Mail Password msaspHBXXXjoestepenovitchenroncom For details on how we protect you privacy please read our Privacy Policy msaspHBXXX Thanks and enjoy The Borders Team Our records indicate that you have expressed interest in receiving a newsletter from Borders and you provided us with your email address If youd no longer like to be included in our email updates or would like to update your email address please click here mubdrstrbaspejoestepenovitchenroncom
